import { Component, Inject, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ContactServiceService } from '../service/contact-service.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { constructor(public service: ContactServiceService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.service.getContacts(); } }
